entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
